body: We should use IsType<Tensor>(CPU) now that TensorCPU and TensorCUDA are all indeed just Tensor.
body_html: We should use IsType(CPU) now that TensorCPU and TensorCUDA are all indeed just Tensor.
body_text: We should use IsType(CPU) now that TensorCPU and TensorCUDA are all indeed just Tensor.
